title: Keegan Swenson takes home the stars and stripes at inaugural US gravel nationals
content:
Windy and dusty conditions make for tactical racing in Nebraska. Alexey Vermeulen, Brennan Wertz, Payson McElveen, and John Borstelmann make up the top five.

Read the full article at Keegan Swenson takes home the stars and stripes at inaugural US gravel nationals on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
